movie.title: Derek's Dead
movie.description_intro: Two former best friends (who currently hate each other) are forced to reconnect when their third former best friend (who they also hate) tasks them with spreading his ashes. There's only one problem: they couldn't care less.
movie.description_full: Two former best friends (who currently hate each other) are forced to reconnect when their third former best friend (who they also hate) tasks them with spreading his ashes. There's only one problem: they couldn't care less.

movies.title: Dirty Sexy Saint
movies.summary: Are you ready to get Dirty Sexy with a Saint. Clay Kincaid knows he's more a sinner than a saint. Especially when it comes to women. With a rough and damaged past that has left him jaded, he doesn't do committed relationships. But he does like sex? the hotter and harder, the better.
movies.description_full: Are you ready to get Dirty Sexy with a Saint. Clay Kincaid knows he's more a sinner than a saint. Especially when it comes to women. With a rough and damaged past that has left him jaded, he doesn't do committed relationships. But he does like sex? the hotter and harder, the better.

movies.title: Hamburger Hill
movies.summary: A brutal and realistic war film focuses on the lives of a squad of 14 U.S. Army soldiers of B Company, 3rd Battalion, 187th Infantry Regiment, 101st Airborne Division during the brutal 10 day (May 11-20, 1969) battle for Hill 937 in the A Shau Valley of Vietnam as they try again and again to take the fortified hill held by the North Vietnamese, and the faults and casualties they take every time in which the battle was later dubbed "Hamburger Hill" because enemy fire was so fierce that the fusillade of bullets turned assaulting troops into shredded hamburger meat.

movies.title: Faces
movies.summary: Richard Forst has grown old. One night, he leaves his wife for Jeannie Rapp, a young woman who does not like friendship. Meanwhile, Richard's wife, Maria, is seduced by Chet, a kind young man from Detroit... A film about the meaningless of life for a certain kind of wealthy middle-aged people.

movies.title: Free Rein Valentine's Day
movies.summary: Love is in the air as Zoe and friends go on a quest to find a fabled Maid's Stone. But when rivalry blinds them to danger, it's Raven to the rescue.
